app_name: MyWed â¤ï¸ Wedding Planner with Checklist and Budget
app_detail:
MyWed is a wedding planner that will keep all the information about the wedding in one place, without any notes in a personal organizer, lots of leaflets and business cards that are constantly lost!
Plan pre-wedding arrangements and tasks (the application will remind you when and what needs to be done), monitor the wedding budget, make lists of vendors and guests, etc. Everything is simple, reliable and convenient!

ğŸ’— Checklist
Add, edit and delete the tasks that you need for wedding preparation. And the app will inform you what and when to do it! Install the pre-wedding arrangement widget on the phone's home screen in order to remember everything!

ğŸ’— Budget
Make a list of wedding expenditures and payments. The app will help to monitor the wedding budget.

ğŸ’— Guests
Make a list of guests; arrange a sitting plan for guests; divide guests into groups (the groom's/bride's side, etc.) and plan the menu. You can easily contact them in the app!

ğŸ’— Vendors
Make lists of vendors with contact information and other data. Call and text them directly in the application. You can link expenditures on the contractors' services with your total budget, so you will not forget how much and who you paid or plan to pay to.

Also:
ğŸ’ Weddings. Your friend is also getting married, and you want to help her? Or maybe you are a wedding planner? In our application you can help to organize several weddings at once.
ğŸ’ Collaborators. Does your spouse want to control your wedding expenses? Or maybe you want your mother or sister to help you to organize your wedding? They can monitor the wedding preparation in the application, and if you allow, then they can make their notes!
ğŸ’ Countdown. The days before the wedding will fly faster with a colorful and stylish countdown. You can install a special widget on the home screen of your phone so you will see the countdown to your wedding.

Advantages:
ğŸ’ Reliable. Are you worried that you may lose data if your phone or tablet breaks down? Do not worry! Sign in, and we will save all the information on the server, and if necessary, synchronize it on all your devices.
ğŸ’ Free. Most application features are available for free. But if you need more features, for example, you want to add more data or change the design of the countdown, you buy Premium for the wedding â€“ and you will get access to all the features of the application.
ğŸ’ Safe. The application is totally safe: all data about your wedding (contacts, media, etc.) are in strict confidentiality; the application does not make calls and does not send SMS without the owner's consent. All the terms the user agrees when installing the application are necessary for correct operation and convenience.

MyWed will help to make the wedding preparation easier than ever!

If you liked our app, please rate it on Google Play. If you have any questions or difficulties, please contact us via email info@mywed.app.
